name: AI Improvements
description: Simplified AI modification mod focused on performance and low-level modifications to AIs in the game
notes: newer versions (1.14+) don't have as much impact as the older versions have, as a lot of fixes to the AI are already implemented

name: Alternate Current
description: An efficient and non-locational redstone dust implementation.

name: Better Beds
description: Removes the Block Entity Renderer from the bed and replaces it with the default minecraft model renderer.

name: Better Biome Blend
description: Accelerates the biome color blending algorithm.

name: Better Fps - Render Distance (Forge)
description: Adds a few performance improvements to increase FPS.

name: Better Fps - Render Distance (Fabric)
description: Adds a few performance improvements to increase FPS.

name: Canary
description: Unofficial Forge port of Lithium

name: Canvas Renderer
description: Advanced Rendering Engine for Fabric

name: Chunk-Pregenerator
description: Allows you to preemptively generate chunks

name: Chunky (Fabric)
description: Pre-generates chunks, quickly and efficiently.

name: Chunky (Forge)
description: Pre-generates chunks, quickly and efficiently.

name: Clumps
description: Clumps groups XP orbs together into a single entity to reduce lag when there are many in a small area.

name: Concurrent Chunk Management Engine
description: Improves the chunk performance of Minecraft.

name: Cull Clouds
description: Adds a small optimization improves clouds building way to not render parts which you cant see to increase fps.

name: Cull Leaves
description: Adds culling to leaf blocks, providing a huge performance boost over vanilla.

name: Cull Less Leaves
description: improved version of Cull Leaves.

name: Cyclonite
description: A mod for entity multithreading.

name: DashLoader
description: Launches minecraft faster by caching all of the content on first launch and then loading that cache on the next one

name: Dimensional Threading
description: Optimizes the processing of multiple Dimensions, by assigning them independent threads

name: Dynamic FPS
description: Automatically reduces rendering speed when minecraft is not focused (to 1 FPS) or hidden (no renders at all). Fixes a Vanilla bug that makes it take much more performance in the background than it should.

name: Dynamic View (Forge)
description: This is a small/light serverside utility mod to help balancing lag (TPS) and chunk view/load distance.

name: Dynamic View (Fabric)
description: This is a small/light serverside utility mod to help balancing lag (TPS) and chunk view/load distance.

name: Enhanced Block Entities
description: Aims to increase the performance of block entity rendering, as well as offer customizability via resource packs.
notes: requires Indium to be installed for compatibility with Sodium

name: Entity Collision FPS Fix (Fabric)
description: Client Side mod that optimizes entities on the render thread.

name: Entity Collision FPS Fix (Forge)
description: Client Side mod that optimizes entities on the render thread.

name: Entity Culling
description: Uses async path-tracing to skip rendering Tiles/Entities that are not visible.

name: Exordium
description: Render the GUI and screens at a lower framerate to speed up what's really important: the worldrendering.

name: Fabric Chunk Pregenerator
description: Allows you to pregenerate chunks for your server or for singleplayer

name: FastAnim
description: FastAnim is a mod that improves the animation speed of entities.

name: FastChest
description: This mod helps by removing dynamic models from chests and making them render as static chunk geometry.

name: FastFurnace
description: Similar to FastWorkbench, it caches the last recipe used, and checks this recipe first before re-scanning the entire registry.

name: Fastload
description: Fastload, is a simple mod that reduces world loading time. This serves as an alternative to ksyxis, which uses an unsafe method of cutting down time.

name: FastSuite
description: FastSuite is a mod about improving recipe performance, it improves upon all mods that use the JSON recipe system, rather than just a specific subset of recipes

name: FastWorkbench
description: This is a mod aimed at improving performance of all crafting-related functions.

name: FerriteCore (Forge)
description: This mod reduces the memory usage of Minecraft in a few different ways

name: FerriteCore (Fabric)
description: This mod reduces the memory usage of Minecraft in a few different ways

name: FixMySpawnR
description: Claims to reduce about half of the tps lag caused by mobspawners.
notes: Requires using a redstone signal to power the mob spawner for a mob farm

name: ForgetMeChunk
description: Fixes the large lag spikes you sometimes get when crossing a chunk border
notes: causes a memory leak that is only reset by changing dimension or leaving the world

name: It Shall Not Tick (ISNT)
description: Limits entity ticking to within a configurable range of players.

name: Krypton
description: Implements a suite of optimizations focused on the Minecraft networking stack.

name: Krypton Reforged
description: Implements a suite of optimizations focused on the Minecraft networking stack.

name: Ksyxis
description: Speeds up your world loading by skipping vanilla's unnecessary 441 chunk loading-unloading on every login.

name: Lazy Language Loader
description: Improves loading times when changing your language by only reloading the language instead of all the game resources!

name: LazyDFU (Fabric)
description: makes the initialization of DataFixerUpper "lazy"

name: LazyDFU (Forge)
description: makes the initialization of DataFixerUpper "lazy"

name: Lithium
description: A general-purpose optimization mod which works to improve a number of systems without changing any behavior

name: Log Begone
description: A fork of Shut Up Console by Bravarly that simply allows you to remove annoying logs. Can also help with performance if there is a lot of log spam

name: MCMT-Fabric
description: Attempts to multithread minecraft's tick execution.

name: MCMTFabricCE
description: Attempts to multithread minecraft's tick execution.

name: MemoryLeakFix
description: Fixes multiple memory leaks, both server-side & client-side.

name: Mipmaplevel and Language Fix
description: Makes changing mipmap levels and language faster, by only reloading the respective part of the game instead of doing a full reload.

name: More Culling
description: changes how blockstate culling is handled in order to improve performance

name: Observable
description: Shows what's lagging your world/server by profiling (tile) entities.

name: Particle Blocker
description: Adds a GUI to pick and choose particles to not render.

name: Phosphor (Fabric)
description: Optimizes one of the game's most inefficient areas, the lighting engine

name: Pluto
description: Unofficial Forge port of Krypton, this mod aims to optimize the network stack of the game in order to provide better network performance.

name: Radium Reforged
description: Unofficial Forge port of Lithium

name: Radon
description: Unofficial Forge port of Phosphor

name: Recipe Cache
description: Caches recipe lookup for crafting and furnaces to lessen server lag caused by crafting stacks of items and large amounts of furnaces ticking

name: Rubidium
description: Unofficial Forge port of Sodium

name: Saturn
description: Optimizes Minecraft's memory usage

name: ServerCore
description: Aims to optimize & add multiplayer features to the minecraft server.

name: Simply No Shading
description: Mimics OptiFine's Internal Shader with Old Lighting OFF by default. Benefits are less lag as this mod is not a shader, stability, and compatibility with other mods.

name: Smoke Suppresion
description: Prevents client-side lag and general annoyance when using large numbers of campfires in farms.

name: Smooth Boot
description: Optimizes loading performance to be smoother on low end systems and scale better on high end systems.
notes: caps the number of worker threads, so on CPUs with lots of cores it might make launching slower.

name: Smooth Boot (Reloaded)
description: Optimizes loading performance to be smoother on low end systems and scale better on high end systems.
notes: caps the number of worker threads, so on CPUs with lots of cores it might make launching slower.

name: Smooth Chunk Save
description: Saves chunks continuously over time, reducing server lag and preventing lagspikes from saving too many chunks at once.

name: Sodium
description: FOSS rendering engine replacement that greatly improves frame rates, reduces micro-stutter, and fixes graphical issues in Minecraft.
notes: no longer available on Curseforge; install Indium for compatibility with mods that use the FRAPI

name: Starlight (Fabric)
description: rewrites the light engine to fix lighting performance and lighting errors

name: Starlight (Forge)
description: rewrites the light engine to fix lighting performance and lighting errors

name: Very Many Players
description: improves general server performance at high playercount without sacrificing vanilla functionality.

name: Vulkan Renderer
description: rewrites Minecraft OpenGL renderer to use Vulkan API.

name: FastBench for Fabric
description: Improves performance of all crafting-related functions.

name: Fast Furnace for Fabric
description: Improves performance of all crafting-related functions.

name: No Mob Generation
description: Prevents animals from spawning in new chunks when the mobcap is full

name: Get It Together, Drops!
description: This mod adds two configuration options to control how dropped items combine on the ground. This can significantly improve performance in areas with lots of dropped items

name: Magnesium
description: Unofficial port of Sodium to Forge.

name: Entity Distance
description: Allows the user to adjust the (client) distance at which different entities render

name: Hydrogen
description: Reduces the memory usage of the game in more modded scenarios

name: Resolution Control+
description: Allows you to change Minecraft's render resolution separately from the HUD elements.

name: Fat Experience Orbs
description: Makes nearby experience orbs merge together

name: Angerable Patch
description: Fixes MC-192362 / MC-189565, which causes drastically large log file sizes and lag

name: Overworld Two
description: Generates overworld and nether terrain much faster than vanilla minecraft at the cost of breaking parity

name: APTweaks
description: Automatically adjusts specific settings on the server and client side to allow a balanced TPS/FPS.

name: DataFixerSlayer
incompat: Any other mod that also removes DFU
description: Prevents the DataFixerUpper (DFU) system from loading

name: Does It Tick?
description: Limits entity ticking outside view distance

name: DrawerFPS
description: Lets you configure the range at which Storage Drawers render items to improve fps.

name: Entity Culling
description: Skips rendering of hidden (tile-)entities.

name: Halogen
description: Unofficial Forge port of Sodium

name: Helium
description: Unofficial Forge port of Hydrogen

name: MCMT
incompat: Immersive Portals, Performant, Clumps, Lycanites Mobs
description: Dispaches all worlds, entities, tile entites and environment ticks to a thread pool, allowing for parallel execution

name: Out of Sight
description: stops modded tile entities from rendering if they are further than 24 blocks away
notes: obvious pop-in of tile entities as you get closer to them

name: Performant
incompat: Botania, IE, Bewitchment, Resourceful Bees, many more
description: improves performance and blocklag.

name: RoadRunner
description: Unofficial Forge port of Lithium

name: Spawner Bug Fix
description: addresses a bug which causes lag in mods that create custom spawners.

name: Sulfuric
description: Forge fork of Phosphor

name: AE2 Unofficial Extended Life
description: Fork of Applied Energistics 2 that comes with many bugfixes and performance improvments

name: AnimFix
description: Decreases the stuttering caused by animated textures in 1.7.10

name: ArchaicFix
description: Implements a number of bugfixes and optimizations for 1.7.10
notes: Some optimizations are incompatible with Optifine and Fastcraft, so they are automatically disabled

name: BetterFps
description: Adds a few performance improvements, trying to be compatible with other mods.

name: Born in a Barn
description: Fixes a Minecraft bug where Village doors keep chunks loaded. No longer needed after Forge 14.23.2.2623

name: CensoredASM
description: Optimizes RAM usage.

name: CoFHTweaks
description: Configuration options

name: FalseTweaks
description: FalsePattern's flagship tweaking, patching, and optimization mod. contains both the features from AnimFix and Triangulator

name: FastCraft
description: A sophisticated mod which improves the client and server performance significantly without any game play changes.

name: FoamFix
description: A mod designed to optimize post-1.7.10 modded Minecraft using simple, targeted optimizations

name: Nothirium
description: A client-side only mod that changes Minecraft's chunk rendering engine to use modern OpenGL which greatly increases performance. This mod is similar to Sodium but this is not a port of Sodium.

name: Particle Culling
description: Stops particles that are outside the player's view from rendering

name: Phosphor
description: Optimizes one of the game's most inefficient areas, the lighting engine

name: Squidless
description: Prevents squids spawning in regions where they would instantly despawn

name: Stackie
description: Increases stack sizes of experience and items

name: Surge
incompat: Mods using outdated mixin versions, Universal Tweaks
description: Aims to improve the load time and performance of the game.

name: TexFix
description: Optimizes the loading of textures of other mods

name: Tick Dynamic
description: Attempts to keep the server at 20tps by dynamically limiting the amount of entities and tile-entities that update per tick

name: Tiquality
description: Limiting a player's tick time in the world to evenly distribute time.

name: Universal Tweaks
incompat: AI Improvements, FastWorkbench, Fast Leaf Decay, Tinkers OreDict Cache, mods using outdated mixin versions
description: A ton of performance and bugfix mods in one

name: VanillaFix
description: Improves performance and fixes bugs and annoyances in vanilla Minecraft

name: Advancements Debug
description: Rewrites one function of the advancements logic to make advancements checking faster, and use less recursion.

name: AntiGhost
description: Removes all ghost blocks whithin a 4 block radius cube with press of a configurable key.

name: AttributeFix
description: Removes attribute caps, which can cause unintended behavior with some mods

name: Axolotl Bucket Fix
description: fixes this so that the item texture shows you what's actually inside it.

name: Bed Bugs
description: Fixes being stuck in a bed and adds persistent chat when getting out of a bed

name: BeeFix
description: Fix a bee bug that causes lag

name: Blanket
description: Fixes a variety of bugs, as well as including some QoL features.

name: Blockfire
description: Fixes the 1.12 bug of fire arrows lighting you on fire through shields.

name: Carpet-Fixes
description: Carpet extension which fixes hundreds of vanilla bugs.

name: Chat Lag Fix
description: Fixes Minecraft client lag from receiving chat messages

name: Connectivity
description: Lightweight mod which solves several connection problems like DecoderException, Packet size larget than X bytes, Payload too large and more.

name: Debugify
description: Fixes a variety of bugs.
notes: MC-147605 patch breaks JEI's search bar (see Debugify#169), can be disabled in config

name: Dimension Fix
description: Fix MC-197860: Deleting a custom dimension in a data pack deletes Nether and End.

name: Dimension Update Fixer
description: Fixes the issue where removing a dimension from a world deletes all other dimensions.

name: DupeFix Project
description: Fix as many dupes as possible so that modpacks and servers can take advantage of several mods without having to ban items from them.

name: Entangled Fix
description: Fixes an issue with the Entangled mod that causes server to hang if an area is unloaded.

name: Erroring Entity Remover
description: Removes entities that throw errors and crash the game while ticking.

name: FabricCrossDimTPFix
description: Fixes a bug where the player doesn't get sent their XP and Potion effects on cross dim teleport.

name: FastOpenLinksAndFolders
description: Stops the game from freezing when opening external links or folders

name: Feature NBT Deadlock Begone
description: Fixes deadlocks caused by MC-246262.

name: fixRTM
description: fixes some RealTrainMod bugs and makes it more useful.

name: FlickerFix
description: By default, when the night vision effect goes below 10 seconds, the screen starts flickering. This mod replaces that behavior with a fast fade-out at 1 second remaining duration.

name: Head Name Fix
description: Mob heads will keep their custom names when placed.

name: IMBlocker
description: Hides the IME (Input Method Editor) where entering text is not required.

name: Inventory Close with Mouse key Fix
description: Allows you to close your inventory with a key bound to a mouse button.

name: Item Model Fix
description: Fixes gaps in generated item models.

name: LagGoggles
description: a profiler where you can see timings in the world, visually.

name: LibreExpFix
description: Fixed experience bug after teleporting across dimensions

name: Map Crash Fixer
description: Fixes a 1.17.1 bug with map crashes.

name: MC122477Fix
description: Fixes MC-122477, the random extra chat character on Unix-based systems.

name: MCMouser
description: Fixes various mouse bugs on macOS.

name: MCPersianTextFixer
description: "Fixes" Persian text rendering.

name: NetherPortalFix
description: Keeps track of what portals a player went through in order to ensure correct destinations when the player is going back through the same portals.

name: Night Vision flash be gone
description: Fixes night vision flashing

name: No Chat Reports
description: Strips the cryptographic signatures from chat messages that were added in 1.19 to stop the chat reporting feature from working

name: No Night Vision Flickering
description: This mod changes night vision flickering/flashing when status effect is expiring to gentle fade-out animation over last 5 seconds(configurable)

name: No Null Processors
description: Fixes crashing when trying to pre-generate large areas of a world.

name: No Time Out No More
description: Enables editing of server timeout time

name: Potion ID Packet Fixer
description: If you have more than 255 potion effects registered, the client will receive incorrect information for potion effects above ID 255, due to an issue with vanilla packets. This mod fixes that issue.

name: PurpurClient
description: Fixes client-side vanilla bugs.

name: RandomPatches (Forge)
description: Contains a bunch of miscellaneous patches for Minecraft

name: Rcon Output Newline
description: Fixes rcon output by appending a newline.

name: Semitranslucency Fix
description: Allows resource packs to use semitranslucent textures.

name: Spark
description: A performance profiler for clients, servers and proxies

name: Spectater
description: fixes a spectator bug.

name: Thorium
description: fixes 50+ small bugs and annoyances in Minecraft.

name: TieFix
description: Fixes some annoying bugs in the Minecraft client.

name: Too Fast
description: Removes the server-side limitations on player speed that result in "player XYZ moved too fast" messages in the console and rubber-banding.

name: ToolTipFix
description: Stops tooltips that are too large to fit on the screen from running off the screen

name: Wither Cage Fix
description: Fixes vanilla bug where withers forget their targets.

name: XL Packets
description: Fixes MC-185901 by raising the packet size limit from 2MB to 2GB, so that servers with large datapacks, packets, etc don't kick the client.

name: XL Packets Fabric
description: Fixes MC-185901 by raising the packet size limit from 2MB to 2GB, so that servers with large datapacks, packets, etc don't kick the client.

name: XXL Packets
description: Fixes MC-185901 by raising the packet size limit from 2MB to 2.14GB, so that servers with large datapacks, packets, etc don't kick the client.

name: Random Patches (Fabric)
description: contains a bunch of miscellaneous patches for Minecraft

name: Ascribe
description: Fix attackedAtYaw syncing.

name: Healer
description: Alternative to FoamFix's log4j vulnerability fix

name: ContainerFix
description: fixes a common issue with many mods that doesn't close the Gui of a Container, even if that container is destroyed or removed somehow.

name: Sledgehammer
description: Fixes several bugs in Minecraft as well as some mods

name: BedBreakBegone
description: Fixes and alleviates nonsense "Your bed was obstructed" errors

name: Block Overlay Fix
description: Fixes xray when standing in block that don't cause suffocation.

name: ASM Fixes
description: Stops a client/server Potion ID mismatch from causing a client crash

name: Biome Decoration Fix
description: Fixes a crash commonly occurring with a lot of heavy worldgen mods installed

name: BugTorch
description: Fixes bugs and backports some features

name: Careful Cast Corrector
description: Fixes an extremely rare case of Crashing in Worldgen

name: Lumy Skin Patch
description: Repairs skins for Minecraft because Mojang no longer supports skins for No-UUID Minecraft versions.

name: MojangFix
description: fixes skins, authentication and more

name: Font Fixer
description: Fixes the font renderer in legacy MC.

name: Legacy LazyDFU
description: LazyDFU is an optimization mod that makes the initialization of DataFixerUpper "lazy"

name: Legacy Advancements Debug
description: Makes advancement checking faster

name: Had Enough Items
description: A fork of Just Enough Items with memory and performance optimizations

name: Hesperus
description: Continuation of Phosphor for 1.12.2, with improved compatibility

name: Let Me Despawn
description: Helps with lag caused by accidental persistent mobs by allowing mobs holding items to despawn
notes: may break certain vanilla farms (eg. iron) and cause items dropped after death to despawn (because a mob picked it up)

name: Multithreaded Noise
description: makes overworld terrain generate faster by replacing the three 3D noise generators in the overworld with multithreaded versions.

name: NormalASM
description: Optimize RAM usage.

name: Unloader
description: Checks for unused dimensions every 30 seconds (600 ticks) to unload by default

name: Tinkers OreDict Cache
description: Caches Tinkers Construct melting recipes to speed up game loading time

name: ChunkPurge
description: Periodically scans the loaded chunks in each dimension that are configured to be scanned, and identifies those which are isolated from any valid chunk watchers, then unloads them

name: Flying Cullers
description: Dynamically adjusts the render distance of entities and tile entities based on your frame rate

name: No Leaf Decay
description: Prevents leaves from decaying

name: NotEnoughItems Unofficial
description: GTNH fork of NotEnoughItems with performance and stability improvements

name: Not Enough Crashes (Forge)
description: improves crashing

name: Not Enough Crashes (Fabric)
description: improves crashing

name: Damage Tilt
description: Restores damage tilt.

name: FPS Reducer
description: reduces unnecessary GPU and CPU load by reducing the frame rate automatically when the client window is inactive

name: HelpFixer
description: Fixes /help command with broken mods

name: Hodgepodge
description: Various Mixins and ASM optimizations
notes: Has notable overlap with other open source mods

name: LoadingProgressBar
description: Makes progress bar work again
notes: Incompatible with some mods that alter the main menu

name: Smooth Font
description: draws all fonts (including resource pack's fonts) smoothly for better readability on all scales

name: TileEntity Reset Fix
description: fix for critical bug in Forge that occasionally resets tile entities

name: VillagerMetaFix
description: forces villagers to check the meta- and NBT-data of the items they are buying.

name: EndlessIDs
description: increases ID limit

name: NotEnoughIDs
description: increases ID limit

name: JustEnoughIDs
description: removes the block, item, biome, potion, and enchantment ID limits by using the 1.13 chunk format in 1.12.

name: Bigger Packets Please
description: increases the default size limit on reception and save read.

name: Entity Render Distance Extender
description: gives a config option to extend from how far away entities render and from how far away they are tracked

name: PotionExtension
description: extends a potion array size to 128.

name: Enchantment ID Extender
description: extends enchantment IDs from 256 to 4096

name: Sampler
description: A sampling profiler (sampler) to see exactly where the Minecraft client/server spends its time

name: Lag Goggles: Legacy
description: profiler where you can see timings in the world, visually

name: Iris Shaders
description: A modern shaders mod for Minecraft intended to be compatible with existing OptiFine shader packs

name: Oculus
description: Forge port of Iris, a modern shaders mod for Minecraft intended to be compatible with existing OptiFine shader packs

name: Cyanide
description: Improves datapack error logging

name: No See, No Tick
description: disables entities ticking if too far away from the player

name: Gotta Go Fast
description: Removes the server-side limitations on player speed that result in "player XYZ moved too fast" messages in the console and rubber-banding.

name: Raw Mouse Input
description: makes mouse input feel smoother and fix mouse jittering.

name: ImmediatelyFast
description: improves the immediate mode rendering performance of the client.

name: RLTweaker
description: bug fixes and performance improvements

name: Lightspeed
description: improves loading time

name: Title Fixer
description: makes titles displayed on-screen always fit inside the screen space.

name: CullLessLeaves Reforged
description: Forge port of Cull Less Leaves

name: Limited Chunkloading
description: Limits chunk-loaders from mods to only stay X time after player logout.

name: ImmediatelyFast Reforged
description: improves the immediate mode rendering performance of the client.

name: ModernFix
description: fix bugs and improve the performance of Forge

name: Shutup Experimental Settings!
description: disables the "Experimental Features" popup that appears every time you create or load a world with custom dimensions or world settings.

name: Disable Custom Worlds Advice
description: disables the "Experimental Features" popup that appears every time you create or load a world with custom dimensions or world settings.

name: Yeetus Experimentus
description: disables the "Experimental Features" popup that appears every time you create or load a world with custom dimensions or world settings.

name: Cull Particles
description: increases FPS by not rendering particles that the player can't see
notes: implemented by newer versions of Forge

name: Chlorine
description: Unofficial Forge port of Sodium

name: Sodium Extra
description: toggle animations, particles, details, rendering, etc

name: Rubidium Extra
description: Unofficial Forge port of Sodium Extra. toggle animations, particles, details, rendering, etc.

name: TabTPS
description: shows TPS, MSPT, etc in the tab menu, boss bar, and action bar; adds commands for checking current TPS, memory and ping

name: Mod Menu
description: adds a list of mods accessed via a menu button
